title: (x) Bodoni inline/highlight but NOT 'Bodoni Highlight' - various suggestions {gang}
content: Looking for an inlined/highlighted _regular_ bodoni- or didot-like font. Closest I've managed to find is [Narcissus](http://web.archive.org/web/20130224080323/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/narcissus/) ...
author: rjohnston

comments.content:
If really sharp edges aren't a must...  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-modern-ii/open/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130224080323/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-modern-ii/open/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-modern-ii/open/")

Sharp edges are, unfortunately, a must.

Your reply did suggest another search term though -- 'openface' -- which turned this up:

[Linotype Didot Openface](http://web.archive.org/web/20130224080323/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=437753)

... which could do the trick.

Thanks!

Robert
There is also [Bodoni Open](http://web.archive.org/web/20130224080323/http:/www.philsfonts.com/spec.html?pf-page=showing&sku=PF00001201P2&start=1) from Phil’s Fonts.

Furthermore:

[FF Acanthus Open](http://web.archive.org/web/20130224080323/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_acanthus_open/) and more [Inline: Serif Open Face & Handtooled](http://web.archive.org/web/20130224080323/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/inline_serif_handtooled/) faces.
